overview: American's top design house is looking for the next trend, and cutting-edge designer Kristal Summers knows where to find it! From hot fetish-wear to outrageous dungeon decadence, she takes her inspiration where she can! Don't miss an uncensored photo shoot, boardroom balling, and a three-way that really gets Kristal's "creative" juices flowing! High fashion has never gone this far!
title: Design For Desire
